snippet.title: Gorgon short play and disk drive sound (Apple II - Sirius)
snippet.description:
Gorgon (https://www.mobygames.com/game/apple2/gorgon) was an action game published by Sirius in 1981 for the Apple ][. The game uses half track copy protection from track 1.5 to E.5, which you can hear in the boot sequence.

PS: The # of lives is stored at address $70. To get infinite lives, change $A5B0 from C6 to A5.

Credits:
Cover art - www.mobygames.com
Disk image - 4AM
